title: Stock market news live updates: Stocks plunge following red-hot inflation print, Fed policymaker's remarks - Yahoo Finance
content: Stock market news live updates: Stocks plunge following red-hot inflation print, Fed policymaker's remarks  Yahoo Finance
description: U.S. stocks were deep in the red on Thursday as Wall Street weighed another decades-high inflation print and remarks by St. Louis Federal Reserve President James Bullard that signaled the central bank could intervene more aggressively than anticipated to tighten monetary conditions amid surging prices levels.
